attributes.action: pay nhs nurses what there worth
attributes.additional_details: We should value are our nurses they pick up the slack when the doctors are on the golf course they are the ones who get assulted swore at abused there the ones who are there with all the families with poorly kids with are elderly parents  pls pay them what  there worth

rejection.details: Please see: 'We believe the NMC should not be allowed to set their own pay and employer pension contributions rates' as this may address the issues you wish to raise.
